item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy for BalleWale

At BalleWale, accessible from ballewale.in, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors.

Information We Collect

We may collect:

  • Name and email if you contact us
  • Usage data like pages visited
  • Device and browser information

Google Analytics

We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use the website. It collects anonymous usage data such as page views, time on site, and device type.

item.description: Shimron Hetmyer shines with the bat while Romario Shepherd takes a hat-trick as West Indies secure a dominant win against Scotland.

item.description: Sri Lanka's struggles in the World Cup create a chance for Ireland to secure a significant upset in their upcoming clash.

item.title: 'We should have potentially sent Pakistan home after today' - van Meekeren rues Netherlands' close loss
item.description: Netherlands' van Meekeren reflects on a narrow defeat to Pakistan, highlighting missed opportunities in their World Cup clash.

item.title: Hetmyer Heroics, Shepherd Hat-Trick Highlight West Indies' Opening Day Win Over Scotland
item.description: West Indies secured a convincing victory over Scotland, thanks to Shimron Hetmyer's explosive batting and Romario Shepherd's hat-trick.

item.title: USA Bowl, India Opt for Siraj as Bumrah Misses Out Due to Illness
item.description: India's bowling lineup sees a change as Jasprit Bumrah is sidelined with illness, paving the way for Mohammed Siraj in the latest match against the USA.

item.title: Hetmyer Heroics and Shepherd's Hat-Trick Lead West Indies to Victory Over Scotland
item.description: West Indies secured a resounding victory over Scotland in their opening match, thanks to Shimron Hetmyer's explosive batting and Romario Shepherd's hat-trick.

item.title: Nabi Takes Seven; Gharami's Unbeaten Ton Keeps Bengal Afloat
item.description: Mohammad Nabi's seven-wicket haul and Sudip Gharami's century helped Bengal fight back in their latest domestic match.

item.title: Injury-hit New Zealand Eye Revenge as Afghanistan Look to Run It Back
item.description: New Zealand faces Afghanistan in a crucial World Cup clash, seeking redemption after previous encounters amidst injury challenges.

item.title: Rashid: Playing International Cricket in Afghanistan 'More Than a Dream'
item.description: Afghan cricketer Rashid Khan shares his heartfelt sentiments about representing Afghanistan on the international stage, emphasizing the significance of cricket for his nation.

item.title: Brook Draws a Line Under Wellington After 'Horrendous' Month in Spotlight
item.description: Harry Brook reflects on a challenging month in Wellington, focusing on future performances after a tough series of matches.

item.title: Gharami's Unbeaten Ton Keeps Bengal Afloat Against Andhra
item.description: Bengal's Gharami scores a crucial unbeaten century to secure a draw against Andhra in the Ranji Trophy match.

item.description: Scotland has won the toss and elected to field against West Indies in their latest ODI match, aiming for a strong performance.

item.title: 'I'd like to play on flat tracks' - Shanaka links SL's batting woes to spin-friendly pitches at home
item.description: Sri Lanka's Dasun Shanaka comments on the challenges faced by batsmen on home pitches, advocating for flatter tracks to improve performance.

item.title: Scotland Opt to Field First Against West Indies in ODI Clash
item.description: Scotland has won the toss and elected to field first against the West Indies in their ODI match, aiming for a strong start in this international encounter.

item.description: Tasmania's Webster shines with the bat, maintaining a slender lead as Bancroft's efforts keep Western Australia in contention.

item.description: Patterson's century leads his team to a strong position in the Test match, showcasing his exceptional batting skills and resilience.

item.description: This is a test cricket article for BalleWale.

item.title: About BalleWale
item.description:
BalleWale is an independent digital sports publication dedicated to delivering timely, accurate, and engaging cricket coverage from around the world.

Our editorial focus includes:

  • International and domestic cricket news
  • Match reports and previews
  • Player updates and team announcements
  • Major tournaments including IPL and ICC events

We aim to present cricket stories in a clear, neutral, and reader-first manner while maintaining high editorial standards.

BalleWale is built for cricket fans who value trustworthy reporting, clean presentation, and easy access to the latest developments in the game.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
We welcome feedback, corrections, and general inquiries.

For all communication, please reach us at:

📧 support@ballewale.in

We strive to respond to genuine requests as promptly as possible.

item.title: Terms & Disclaimer
item.description:

Content Disclaimer

All content is published for informational purposes only. While we strive for accuracy, BalleWale does not guarantee the completeness or reliability of any information.

External Links

Our website may include links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or practices of these external sites.

Copyright

All original content on this site is the property of BalleWale unless otherwise stated. Unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.
